common.message1: Accept easy contactless payments via PayPal, credit or debit cards, and more.
common.message2: Everything you need to accept payments and run your business.
common.take_credit_or_debit_card_payments_throu: Take credit or debit card payments through your Booking Page or calendar.
common.time_based_operations: Required to configure all the time based on operations on your Number.
common.automate_notifications: Automate notifications for new, edited and cancelled bookings
common.edited_rescheduled_bookings: Automate notifications for edited or rescheduled bookings
common.admin_has_updated_language: The account admin has updated your app’s default language from
common.take_effect_click_refresh: For the change to take effect, simply click ‘Refresh’.
common.click_the_activate: Click the ‘Activate’ button on the left side of this window.
common.you_can_now: You can now take payments from your calendar. To accept Booking Page payments, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page Payments.
common.account_for_cash: Account for cash transactions at different locations and on the go.
common.bookng_payments_navigation: You can now take payments from your calendar. If you’d like to take payments from your Booking Page, navigate to Settings > Payments > Booking Page
common.copy_code_squarespace: Copy the code below and log into Squarespace.
common.copy_code_squareline: Copy the code below and log into Square Online.

app_tour.caption: Grow your business
app_tour.description: Reach your customers, collaborate with your team and connect with prospects, using one app. From Anywhere.
list: Connect with your team any time

app_tour.caption: Access all your messages
app_tour.description: Get a real-time feed of all your latest calls and messages, in one intuitive inbox.
list: View a summary of your messages

app_tour.caption: Connect any time
app_tour.description: Chat one-to-one with your colleagues and customers, or collaborate in a group.

app_tour.caption: Effortless one-click video calling
app_tour.description: Create your unique meeting room URL and host easy and secure online video chats.
list: Lock your meeting room for privacy

app_tour.caption: Manage your calls and contacts
app_tour.description: View recent calls, contact information and interaction history using your all-in-one online phonebook.

app_tour.caption: Welcome your customers
app_tour.description: Add a personal touch to your service by customizing how our live receptionists receive your callers.
list: View and edit your billing details

contacts.contacts_are_ready: contact(s) are ready to be imported
contacts.contacts_has_invalid: contacts has invalid information. Please fix errors or remove invalid contacts.

integrations.connectwise_description: Export your call intake to ConnectWise
connectwise_long_description: Ensure that your ConnectWise campaign reaches the intended target audience with LEX Reception. For every new customer created at LEX Reception, this integration will automatically add corresponding contact information to your ConnectWise campaign list.
connectwise_instruction: Click the Activate button on the left side of this window.
Enter your ConnectWise username and password to allow access to LEX Reception.
Confirm the action by clicking Allow. The integration will now be activated.

integrations.to_enable_this: To enable this integration, you must allow Setmore and <APP NAME>to share details
integrations.you_must_select: You must select a business location to continue integrating your accounts. Please try again
integrations.to_host_video: To host video appointments using <APP NAME>, you’ll need to switch off the <APP NAME integration>
integrations.to_enable_your: To enable your team to host Google Meet appointments, you’ll need to open individual profiles and switch on ‘Google sync
integrations.activate_a_payment: Activate a payment integration to accept Booking Page payments
integrations.setmore_is_currently: Setmore is currently syncing your <APP NAME>. Please wait a few moments before de-activating the sync. Thank you for your patience!
integrations.support_team_contact: Chat with our support team from inside your account, call us at <CONTACT NUMBER> or email <SUPPORT EMAIL>.
integrations.integration_meets_complaince: Before activating, make sure that your use of the integration meets compliance and data security requirements, such as HIPAA, in your area <Terms of Service>.
integrations.third_party_integration: By enabling a 3rd Party Integration service, you hereby agree to assume HIPAA liability for your use of this service and agree to our HIPAA compliant <Terms of Service>.
integrations.only_tagged_pictures: Only tagged pictures from your Instagram account will be shown on your Booking page.
